parameter.name: onCommandId
parameter.label: On Command
parameter.description: Specifies command that represents ON for this device. If not specified, will treat 1, 3, 5-13 and 15 as ON commands for receiving message, and will send 1 as an ON command. This behaviour is deprecated. In a future version, if this is not specified, the on command will not be available.

parameter.name: offCommandId
parameter.label: Off Command
parameter.description: Specifies command that represents OFF for this device. For historical reasons, if not specified, will treat 0, 2, 4 and 14 as OFF commands for receiving message, and will send 4 as an OFF command. This behaviour is deprecated. In a future version, if this is not specified, the off command will not be available.

parameter.name: openCommandId
parameter.label: Open Command
parameter.description: Specifies command that represents OPEN for this device.

parameter.name: closedCommandId
parameter.label: Closed Command
parameter.description: Specifies command that represents CLOSED for this device.
